member.name: T:Puzzle_Creation.CCTE_LW
member.summary: Summary description for CCTE_LW.

member.name: T:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator
member.summary: This class is responsible for random creating an appropriate 3D puzzle.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.direction
member.summary: This is an index variable that will navigate the the puzzle char[,,] structure.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.xBoundary
member.summary: This boundary variable will define the limits of the puzzle.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.yBoundary
member.summary: This boundary variable will define the limits of the puzzle.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.zBoundary
member.summary: This boundary variable will define the limits of the puzzle.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.dictionaryCreator
member.summary: DictionaryCreator reference needed for the puzzle's constructon.

member.name: F:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.random
member.summary: Random number generator of the puzzle construction.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.GetBoundaries
member.summary: Public helper method for getting the puzzle boundaries.
member.returns: The boundaries in the form of an int[] of three elements each containing the respective boundaries.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor for the PuzzleCreator class.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.Parse(ns_RedBlack.RedBlack)
member.summary: Polymorphically overrideable method for respective parsing.
member.param: This RedBlack Tree node is the head node of the tree representing the dictionary.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.FillRemainingCubes
member.summary: This method is responsible for cheching the remaining empty cubes in the puzzle, and then fill them with a random character from a to z lowercase.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.GeneratePuzzle
member.summary: This method calls all of the overriden Parse() methods and merges all of the resultant puzzle directions into one puzzle.
member.returns: The method will return the Randomly Generated Puzzle.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.GetLengthDimentions
member.summary: This helper method will will get the length of each x, y, and z side of the char[,,] puzzle

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.Reverse(System.Char[])
member.summary: This method will reverse a C# char[].
member.param: This parameter is the char[] string to reverse.

member.name: P:Puzzle_Creation.PuzzleCreator.Direction
member.summary: Property Direction (int) read access to directional argorithm indicator.

member.summary: Part of temporary helper interger variable.

member.summary: Part of temporary helper interger variable.

member.summary: Polymorphically overrideable method for respective parsing.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.CCTE_LW.CountInsertLength(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This helper method count the next available set of cells to insert into.
member.returns: The next available amount of cells.

member.name: M:Puzzle_Creation.CCTE_LW.InsertWord(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This helper method will insert the specified word starting at the (posx,posy,posz) position along the CCTS_LN direction inside the puzzle.
